note.p: German philosopher. Studied theology in Dorpat; Hegelian philosophy in Berlin, 1826. Ordained, 1828; pastor in Livonia until 1832. DPhil, Kiel, 1830. Habilitated in philosophy, Berlin, 1834; professor extraordinarius, 1836; professor, Halle, 1839. Member of the Naturforschende Gesellschaft zu Halle (Natural Science Society of Halle) from 1848; committee member, 1879.
Nachlaß Johann Eduard Erdmann (Yi 4 II 1.2.8), http://sundoc.bibliothek.uni-halle.de/nachlaesse/erdmann.htm (accessed 23 March 2018)
